fullplot: On the wedding day of a writer's friend, things aren't looking good when the groom goes missing before the ceremony. During his and his other male friend's effort to retrieve him, that writer named Mike can't help but tell the story of his youth with his friends. Ever since he met them on his first day at a new school, they shared the common experiences of growing up and life's discoveries.
plot: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.
title: The Wood

tomatoes.consensus: A charming piece of work with believable characters.
